nchack.NCData.select_variables¶

NCData.select_variables(self, vars=None, cores=1)¶

Select variables from tracker

Parameters

  • months (list or int) -- Month(s) to select.

  • cores (int) -- Number of cores to use if files are processed in parallel. Defaults to non-parallel operation

Returns

Reduced tracker with the variables selected

Return type

nchack.NCData

Previous topic

nchack.NCData.select_years

Next topic

nchack.NCData.remove_variables
